column2: In this matter the Accused -Appellant Soosai Sutharasan was indicted in
the High Court of Vauniya on two counts namely kidnapping a  girl by the name
of Arogyanadan  Anusha  below  the  age  of  16  years  on  12.06.2004  an  offence
punishable under Section 354 of the  Penal Code  and also for  committing

column1: on her on the same day.  The Accused-Appellant was absent at the trial and the

column6: learned  Trial  Judge  after  hearing  the
